english.segment1: Dripping wet with practiced sincerity, Cute slogans for tangible mysteries. You reduce your god (pruned to profit your ego). to a tv commercial, "Buy what I sell! (advertise, advertise!)" you scream, "Purchase my lifestyle!"
english.segment2: I once held the key, but now I have nothing. You are so naive. I'm sorry for leading you along. I'm just a man, I'm just a man. I'm just a man!
english.segment3: Wake me up and wipe the cliche from my eyes. It's killing me when all I see is hypocrisy and lies. I know that my faults bring me down, it's a constant battle. That's why I have to be honest with you now.. I'm not your saint, I'm not your savior
english.segment4: I once held the key, but now I have nothing. You are so naive. I'm sorry for leading you along. I'm just a man, I'm just a man. I'm just a man!
english.segment5: I once held the key to everything you ever dreamed of. Now I have nothing. I'm sorry for leading you along. I'm just a man, I'm just a man. I'm just a man!
english.segment6: Just a man, Just a man!
